--- pagetitle: "2026 American Psychology-Law Society Conference" toc: false css: index.css editor: source description: | The annual conference for the American Psychology-Law Society for 2026 will be held in Reno, NV from March 12-14th. includesource: true --- :::::: column-screen ::::: hero-banner :::: content-block ### 2026 Annual Conference of the American Psychology-Law Society #### {{< fa location-dot aria-hidden="true" >}} Reno, Nevada #### {{< fa calendar aria-hidden="true" >}} March 12-14, 2026 ::: hero-buttons [Learn More](#register){.button-17 .btn-guide role="button"} ::: :::: ::::: :::::: ::: column-screen ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: # General Information {#info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa circle-info aria-hidden="true" >}} Welcome! ![](../images/2026_announcement.png) ::: ::: vspace ::: ::::: column-screen :::: {.simple-info-blue .alt-background-blue} ::: content-block-blue ##### Want to learn more about the [AP-LS Annual Conference]{.highlight}? [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right aria-hidden="true" >}}](archive/index.qmd){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: :::: ::::: ::: vspace ::: # Registration {#register} :::::::: simple-info-center ::::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info #### {{< fa id-badge aria-hidden="true" >}} Online registration is open on December 1st! ::: vspace ::: [*If you have any issues registering, please email
{{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.office >}}*]{.session-chair} ::: vspace ::: [Click Here {{< fa arrow-right-long aria-hidden="true" >}}](https://apls.memberclicks.net/apls2026conference/){.btn .btn-outline-primary .ml-auto role="button"} ::: vspace ::: ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:======================+:================+:=============+ | AP-LS Full Members | \$345 | \$380 | +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ | AP-LS ECP Members | \$240 | \$270 | +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ | Non Members | \$170 | \$575 | +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ | AP-LS Student Members | \$90 | \$125 | +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ | Non Members Students | \$170 | \$210 | +-----------------------+-----------------+--------------+ ::: ::::::: ::::::::
::: vspace ::: # Preconference Workshops {#preconference} :::::: simple-info-center ::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn aria-hidden="true" >}} Info ##### [{{< fa calendar aria-hidden="true" >}} Wednesday, March 11, 2026]{.highlight} ::: vspace ::: [*Attendees will have the ability to register for the pre conference workshops with their conference registration*]{.session-chair} ::: vspace ::: [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right-long aria-hidden="true" >}}](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Wsyd1wKizn0L44bmq-_TxDvxXLYEiOyV/view?usp=sharing){.btn .btn-outline-primary .ml-auto role="button"} ::: vspace ::: ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS ### Full-Day Workshop Rates +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:======================+:================+:===============+ | AP-LS Full Members | \$200 | \$230 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | AP-LS ECP Members | \$200 | \$230 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non Members | \$250 | \$280 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | AP-LS Student Members | \$80 | \$100 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non Members Students | \$100 | \$120 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ### Half-Day Workshop Rates +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:======================+:================+:===============+ | AP-LS Full Members | \$100 | \$115 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | AP-LS ECP Members | \$100 | \$115 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non Members | \$125 | \$140 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | AP-LS Student Members | \$80 | \$100 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non Members Students | \$50 | \$60 | +-----------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ::: ::::: ::::::
::: vspace ::: # Hotel Information {#hotel} ::::::: simple-info :::::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa hotel aria-hidden="true" >}} Peppermill Resort Spa Casino ![](https://images.bestwestern.com/bwi/brochures/29095/photos/1024/25995732.jpg){fig-align="center" fig-alt="Exterior view of the Peppermill Resort Spa Casino"}
[{{< fa map aria-hidden="true" >}} Plan your trip](https://www.worldhotels.com/content/luxury-hotels/en_US/book/hotels-in-reno/peppermill-resort-spa-casino/propertyCode.29095.html){.btn .btn-outline-primary role="button"} [{{< fa location-dot aria-hidden="true" >}} Map](){.btn .btn-outline-primary role="button"}
::: vspace ::: [Conference Rates]{.plenary} :::: session-description Attendees can also call the Peppermill to make their reservation. They just need to mention your group code to receive your group rate and waived resort fee. Group code: `CAPLS26` ::: hero-buttons [{{< fa bell-concierge aria-hidden="true" >}} Book a Room](https://book.passkey.com/event/51002110/owner/7268/home){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} [{{< fa hotel aria-hidden="true" >}} Website](https://www.worldhotels.com/content/luxury-hotels/en_US/book/hotels-in-reno/peppermill-resort-spa-casino/propertyCode.29095.html){.btn-action .btn .btn-dark .ml-auto role="button"} ::: :::: :::::: :::::::
